Deletion of edeB gene significantly inhibited the expression of ede BGC

To study the effect of EdeB on the transcription of ede BGC, we compared the expression of genes edeA (encoding a transporter protein), edeQ (encoding a resistance enzyme), and edeK (encoding a non-ribosomal peptide synthase, NPRS) between X23(ΔedeB) and wild-type B. brevis X23. And the 16S rRNA gene with stable transcriptional expression was selected as the internal reference.
